meanings.definition: A representation of the Hindu deity Shiva in the form of a phallus.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the priest displayed the lingams to honor Shiva.
meanings.sent2: The lingams are important symbols in Hindu religious ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to steal one of the lingams from the temple.
meanings.sent4: The lingams stood tall and proud, representing the divine energy of Shiva.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the lingams made them truly unique and sacred.

meanings.definition: A symbol of divine generative energy, often associated with the god Shiva.
meanings.sent1: People believe that the lingams hold the powerful energy of Shiva.
meanings.sent2: In temples, you can often see lingams placed as symbols of Shiva's energy.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they mistook the lingams for ordinary stones.
meanings.sent4: The lingams seemed to radiate a mystical energy, captivating all who saw them.
meanings.sent5: The ancient texts describe the lingams as embodiments of divine creativity.

meanings.definition: A sacred object used in Hindu worship.
meanings.sent1: The priest carefully cleansed the lingams before the morning prayers.
meanings.sent2: Devotees offer flowers and incense to the lingams during rituals.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran off with one of the small lingams from the altar.
meanings.sent4: The glow of the candlelight flickered softly against the smooth surface of the lingams.
meanings.sent5: The devotees felt a sense of peace and reverence when they touched the sacred lingams.
